description: System-generated primary key for the employee record.
Date/time the record was last created or updated, in system format.
Flag indicating the person is inactive or terminated in the system.
Effective date the person was released or terminated from employment.
Official hire or start date with the organization.
Employee’s date of birth for identification and compliance.
Primary mobile phone number for the employee.
Fax number associated with the employee, if any.
Alternate contact number or extension for the employee; may hold backup or on-call numbers.
Primary work phone or main contact number.
Postal/ZIP code for the employee’s mailing address.
City for the employee’s mailing or home address.
Second address line (apartment, suite, building, attention, etc.).
Primary street or mailing address for the employee.
Employee’s family or last name.
Employee’s given or first name.
Human Resources or payroll employee number used to identify the person.
Free-form notes related to the employee (administrative or operational remarks).
Free-text explanation for employment release or termination; may include HR notes or rehire status.
Hourly labor or billing rate used in work orders/timekeeping; likely currency. Confirm with SME.
Work email address for the employee.
Code for the employee’s work shift or schedule pattern.
Lookup reference or display label source for the shift code; confirm with SME.
Code/ID referencing the state or province of the address (foreign key to location list).
Lookup reference or table source for the state/province code; confirm with SME.
Code for the employee’s job title or classification.
Lookup reference or table source for the job title code; confirm with SME.
Organizational unit code within a multi-level hierarchy (e.g., division/department). Exact level mapping is installation-specific; confirm with SME.
Lookup reference or table source for the organizational unit code; confirm with SME.
Top-level organizational unit code within the company hierarchy; confirm exact mapping with SME.
Lookup reference or table source for the top-level hierarchy code; confirm with SME.
Binary image of the employee’s photo (BLOB).
Identifier for this employee in a legacy source system, for migration traceability.
Name of the legacy source table where the employee originated.
Employment type or category (e.g., employee, contractor, temp) used for access and reporting.
Digital signature image or captured signature data for forms and approvals.
Employee age in years or an age code; confirm calculation/source with SME.
Coded value representing the employee’s ethnicity for reporting and compliance.
Lookup reference or table source for the ethnicity code; confirm with SME.
Coded value representing the employee’s gender.
Lookup reference or table source for the gender code; confirm with SME.
Coded reason for employment release or termination (foreign key to reasons list).
Lookup reference or table source for the release/termination reason code.
Identifier of the employee’s manager or supervisor (foreign key to the employee table).
Reference to the entity or table used by the manager field; confirm with SME.
Second-level organizational unit code in the hierarchy (e.g., department/section). Exact mapping may vary; confirm with SME.
Lookup reference or table source for the second-level hierarchy code; confirm with SME.
Preferred spoken or written language for communications.
